name: Immediate parent according to AnaCredit indicator
description: An indicator specifying if the immediate parent is the immediate parent according to Regulation (EU) 867/2016, data attribute Immediate parent undertaking identifier; "Counterparty identifier for the legal entity which is the immediate parent undertaking of the counterparty. If the counterparty has no parent undertaking, the counterparty identifier for the counterparty itself is to be reported. Parent undertaking has the same meaning as defined in Article 4(1)(15)(a) of Regulation (EU) No 575/2013.".
